get.description: Get all accounts or filter using account name. The account name must be an alphanumeric lowercase hex string between 2 to 40 characters long

accountName.description: accountName should be alphanumeric, lowercase and between 2 to 40 characters long

example.message: get only api key cannot access POST /account

preferredAccountName.description: preferred bank account name for merchant bank account creation
preferred bank account name for merchant bank account creation

post.description: Resolve bank account by account number and bank code.

get.description: Get discounts applied on USD-NGN offramp transaction rates based on the transaction amount.

methods.hint: An email with a verification code will be sent to abc***def@gmail.com
Sms with a verification code will be sent to phone 0818***1234
Sms with a verification code will be sent to phone 0818***5678
Sms with a verification code will be sent to your alternate phone number

put.description: Confirm phone number associated with account BVN.

phone.description: phone number associated with account bvn

accountNumber.description: bank account number for bank account verification

bankCode.description: bank code associated with user's bank

post.description: Resolve bank account by account number and bank code.

token.description: 6 digit token from authenticator app; not required when using API key

422.description: post mock deposit fiat unprocessable entity

500.description: get pricing pending internal server error

get.description: Trigger pricing reminder, charge, retry or receipt.

cancelPendingRampRequest.description: users can only have one pending RampRequest at a time; if you have a pending RampRequest, set CancelPendingRampRequest as true; defaults to false

expireAction.description: allows you to choose what should happen to your ramp request if the current rate is no longer applicable; default is useCurrentRate

rampExpTime.description: allows you to set when you need the ramp to expire or cancel; default is 1 hour

type.description: initiate offramp with cryptoToFiat type and onramp with fiatToCrypto type

example.message: Rates not available, please try again later

200.description: get rate verify rate key ok

400.description: get rate verify rate key bad request

get.description: Get a list of supported assets including symbols, contract details, withdrawal constraints, and transaction explorer links.

parameters.description: Number of transactions to return. Default is 100 and maximum is 1000
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Unix timestamp in seconds. Must be less than UnixEndDate
parameters.name: unixStartDate

parameters.description: Unix timestamp in seconds. Must be greater than UnixStartDate
parameters.name: unixEndDate

otp.description: 6 digit otp from authenticator app; required if withdrawal request is made with jwt token

example.message: no withdrawal api key cannot access POST /transfer/withdraw

put.description: Update user endpoint ID and callback URL.

apikey.description: supplied if there's an existing api key that needs to be deleted

keyname.description: key identifier of the user's choice

scope.description: permission level of the apiKey; get api key scopes to see valid scopes; use M for a master key; G for a get only key; W for a withdrawal permitted key; and N for a no withdrawal key

get.description: Get the valid scopes for API jey generation.
Get preferred registration type, fee settings, deposit account, and crypto payment source.

put.description: Update preferred registration type, fee settings, deposit account, and crypto payment source.

autoMoveDeposit.description: select true if all user's account deposits should be held in the user's main account; defaults to false

cryptoPaymentSource.description: select known if crypto wallets are to a user provided address; select unknown addresses generated by the service; defaults to known

get.description: Trigger pricing reminder, charge, retry or receipt.
